headline: Trimble and Daimler Truck North America Modernize Truck Maintenance with New Integration Simplifying Repairs
summary: TrimbleⓇ (Nasdaq: TRMB) and Daimler Truck North America (DTNA) have announced the integration of Trimble Road Call, a vehicle breakdown module within the Trimble TMT Fleet Maintenance™ solution, with Freightliner Service Tracker. Launched at the Technology & Maintenance Council's Annual Meeting and Transportation Technology Exhibition, the integration aims to simplify the increasingly complex repair process for commercial fleets.

content.title: Trimble and Daimler Truck North America Modernize Truck Maintenance with New Integration Simplifying Repairs

headline: Xona Space Systems Announces Collaboration with Trimble to Deliver Next-Gen Navigation Services
summary: Xona Space Systems (Xona), a leading pioneer of advanced commercial satellite navigation solutions announces a new collaboration with Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB), a global leader in construction, transportation and geospatial technology. Xona and Trimble are pursuing the integration of Trimble correction services with Xona's PULSAR™ high-performance navigation service.
